https://portswigger.net/web-security/cross-site-scripting/dom-based

SOURCE VS SINK To test for DOM XSS in an HTML ==sink==, place a random alphanumeric string into the ==source== (such as location.search), then use developer tools to inspect the HTML and find where your string appears.
